title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A GPU Problem
message:
Hello Everybody

This machine come with kernel panic problem when working graphics or video . I know this machine have GPU issue but extended warranty ended. 
Problem is looking like mid 2010 GPU switch problem. When started ASD kernel panic with this report;

[I]Video Controller External: Gmux switch to EG and verifiy (test 4) test will switch display to EG and Verify.[/I]

Replaced C8930,C8931,C8943,C8942 but nothing changed. 

Do you have any other suggestions before try the video chip?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A GPU Problem
message: Nop, apply some heat in the core of the chip (about 180°C)and try again, if it works is time ti replace GPU....

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A GPU Problem
message: Replace the GPU. Remove the glue on the VRAM!!

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A GPU Problem
message: Thank you Duke after replacement GPU problem solved.
